fields.customfield_11004:
*As a Research Moderator I want to download all Shopping Sessions reports in one CSV format file*
* User can download all shopping sessions report just after finishing shopping
* User can download all shopping sessions report from Shopping Research panel
* System will download the report to user's desktop
* Name of the file: 'ProjectName All shopping reports date', where date has the following format '16-08-2016'

User can download report from Shopping Researches panel (https://reddotsquare.atlassian.net/browse/NG-12059) and shopping research dashboard (https://reddotsquare.atlassian.net/browse/NG-12057)

fields.summary: Research Moderator downloads research results as CSV file

status.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.
status.name: In Progress

fields.description:
Reported by [~johnos] in http://support.vrinfinity.com/helpdesk/tickets/21540.  Verified by [~amberj]

Planograms held in switches are being moved on save with overwrite, and object property colours are not being saved

Reproduction steps:
* Clone the store below
* Visualise all POGs in 2D, by using the silver and gold palnogram switches
* View switches Initial, Gold and Silver
* Correct layout as shown in video
* Correct POS colours as shown in the video
* Save with overwrite
* Close project
* relaunch project

Expected results: Changes should be saved
Actual result: Planograms move to elsewhere in the scene and OBJ colour revert to default grey

I have been able to reproduce this with save with overwrite and save as new

*Please note that @john has a presentation in China this Wednesday, and is +8 hours to London.  This needs to be resolved by end of day on Tuesday so that he can use this project.*

Scene: Carrefour-Laundry-Amber (https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/ui/projects/47d3c4dd-564f-4a16-9c56-6d1ba0e0e0c7)
User credentials: UL_KRVR_Support / dXGR5&CJ2I

The scene that I created from this original store: AJ#2150(3-clone) (https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/ui/projects/70371cf3-5612-45a0-9597-9a7255e050c8)

https://ktglbuc-my.sharepoint.com/personal/amberj_reddotsquare_com/_layouts/15/guestaccess.aspx?guestaccesstoken=q%2f7%2fpYFs8aNenCOLn26QnhyR6%2fwWitjtj6UtVi9MroE%3d&docid=1e3225a82ff724751ba7f0f4bdafd4369&rev=1
fields.summary: Planogram positions changed on saving with overwrite in switches, and OBJ colour texture NOT being saved

comments.body: #21540 (http://support.vrinfinity.com/helpdesk/tickets/21540) - VR Infinity Bug: Not-remembering-change-in-position-after-reopen

Logs of VRI player, after saving [^output_log - Copy.txt] 
Logs of VRI player after re-opening scene   [^output_log - Copy (2).txt]

[~amberj], hello. Could you add some more detailed steps for " Correct layout as shown in video and Correct POS colours as shown in the video" 
Do user need to execute the same steps in the same sequence? Or enough to move some planogram and then change obj color to white? Which actions are mandatory for reproducing this bug? Because I can't reproduce this bug in another scene using the similar steps

*STR* OBJ colour texture NOT being saved
# Launch scene https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/ui/projects/c026a8af-6bbe-40f4-925e-fa072314e2b0 under UL_KRVR_Support / dXGR5&CJ2I
# Select switch "Silver" 
# Change for next object color to white  !Screenshot_837.png|thumbnail!  !Screenshot_836.png|thumbnail! 
# Overwrite scene 
# Re-launch scene 

*AcR* Changes weren't saved. I Can't reproduce it on another scene. 
*ExR* Changes were saved 

[~amberj], I can't reproduce problem with planogram positions changed on saving with overwrite even on original scene, please see previous comment

Hi [~tema@ciklum.com] - I don't believe that you need to change things in a particular order.  The screen capture that I did was not done in a special order.  Is the other project that you are trying this on under your account, or under the Unilever admin account?  Is it possible that it is an account issue, an issue with the project, or that there is an issue with the small planogram bays that [~johnos] created and uploaded?

[~amberj], I tried under my account. 
It will be very useful  if you add another scene, where you can reproduce it. Because for now it looks like an issue with the project
And want to mention, that I am able to reproduce  problem with obj only on clone of scene from description. And  am unable to reproduce problem with planogram positions  on any scene.
[~johnos], would you be able to send me the planogram squares that you have been using for that project, so that I can upload them to a different project under the RDSS Presenter's group? Thanks!

Hi Amber, of course but can you clarify what actual source elements you need from me in order to do this.  To get this into my target store I uploaded using Conversion manager to a the stores Collection - from there I added it to the catalogue.  If it is easier I can do this to a particular store for you?

Regards,

John

Thanks, [~johnos].  Perhaps it would be easiest if you could do it to a specific store for [~tema@ciklum.com]?  [~tema@ciklum.com] can you let John know which store he should upload the collection to?

[~johnos], you can use this store https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/ui/projects/b0f31b38-5896-44bc-81e3-6047620ae0a5 under Ciklum_Tetiana_Markova / 123456Mt
Thank you in advance!
[~johnos], hello. When could you help me with reproducing this bug? I mean, uploading your content to store from previous comment

fields.description:
Reported by [~johnos] in http://support.vrinfinity.com/helpdesk/tickets/21593

I’ve just open my scene “Carrefour-Laundry32” and was unable to move – I could only rotate?  I’ve tried reopening and save as and this didn’t fix it.  I’m logged in as “UL_Jack_Shen”
 
Last time I was in the scene the same thing happened but I’ve seen this before and restarting the project solved it.  I believe this happened after I changed the material of my asset which was just 1 face which made it disappear.

Scene: Carrefour-Laundry32 (https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/ui/projects/278701a6-f3a6-40ee-a306-4947dad5af70)
Credentials: UL_KRVR_Support / dXGR5&CJ2I

[~amberj] has verified that I am unable to move in the scene

[~johnos] Please can you provide more information about which OBJ and texture you were using?

*UPDATE (10th Aug)** Adding tdetails from duplicate ticket NG-12108
Reported by Greg at GSK in https://krvreu.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/20584
He is unable to move (right click and drag). I have replicated this on my computer. Turning is possible, but forward and backward movement is not possible. I checked the base store of Walgreens, and this is functioning as it should.
Reproduction steps:
Launch scene (scene and login credentials reported below). I launched from Chrome
try to move
expected result: able to move and turn freely
actual result: unable to move (turning is possible)
I have tried cloning the store, changing the height of the user, and using jump points, but none allow forward and backwards
Scenario: Walgreens Demo Store (https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/ui/projects/a0977151-8ea3-448f-b882-da74ca035125)
GSK_KRVR_Support / Gt9#241djL
fields.summary: User unable to move in a specific scene after applying a texture to an OBJ

comments.body:
[~johnos] - not from [~tema@ciklum.com]:
such situation could have a pace, if you 1. create waypoint1 2. move in another point 3. drag to waypoint1 some object 4. jump to waypoint1

[~amberj], I launched this scene and problem is in something else. Cycling trough waypoints doesn't help. 
Logs attached  [^output_log.txt] 
We are waiting updates from [~johnos]
It is similar to https://reddotsquare.atlassian.net/browse/NG-12108

Hi Tetiana, Yes, I also suspected this was the issue.  This asset is an object with just one face and when I applied a white material it disappeared.  Because it disappeared I couldn't think of a way of find it to then delete it - so went back to a previous version and re did the work.  I've since replaced this with a double planed object.  Regards, John
[~johnos], do you have a source file of this asset? And how this asset was uploaded? using asset uploader?

Hi Tetiana, Yes, I've attached above.  It was uploaded in the same way as all other assets - using the Asset Uploader to a particular Unilever collection ( CH-Laundry (Fronts)) and then added to the Menu Catalogue with "Add from Existing"

[~johnos], thank you. 
I can reproduce it under my account with different scenes 

*Preconditions* 
# Upload attached obj via asset uploader 
# Add uploaded obj to MC https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/uiold/edit/b48db004-466f-1a43-a6e7-1735eb2ce458

*STR* 
# Launch scene  https://vrinfinity.com/cloudlibrary/ui/projects/cd87989b-f841-466e-aa48-ebf47627aadf under Ciklum_Tetiana_Markova / 123456Mt 
# Drag obj from catalogue (assets/ fixtures/ custom fixtures/ 12)
# Open properties for new object and close it 

*AcR* User can't navigate 
*ExR* User should navigate without problems 

*Note* Width of this obj = 0
[~anka@ciklum.com], please describe how we should work with object, whose height/width/depth =0

If there is a field with 0 value, user can't change it. User can select field, change the value, but after unfocusing the value will still be 0.
On the other hand user can't set 0 value for a field with value higher than 0. The same behavior of UI should be as in previous case.
